results.firPara: Harry Kane is set to sign a lucrative new five-year contract with Tottenham in the coming weeks after agreeing a deal to make him the clubs best-paid player.
results.secPara: Kane, who finished last season as the Premier Leagues Golden Boot winner with 25 goals, failed to find the net at Euro 2016 as England were knocked out in the last-16 by Iceland.
results.webTitle: Harry Kane set to sign new five-year contract with Tottenham
Football quiz: how well do you know your European Championship balls?

results.firPara: Of the 24 teams at Euro 2016, two began the tournament with a back three. One of them remains in the tournament; the other went out in the quarter-finals to a side that switched to a back three in order to beat them. This has been the tournament when the back three bit back.
results.secPara: Does it mean anything? Does international football still have the power to inspire imitators? Will next season see a wave of sides aping Wales, Italy and Germany? In truth, probably not. The gulf between club and international football is so great now, the levels of sophistication in the club game so far in advance of international football that the flow of ideas can only really go one way. The apparent over-performance of the back three, if it signals anything beyond the fact that Wales and Italy have played well, is evidence of little more than the reactiveness of the football in this tournament.
results.webTitle: The Question: why has 3-5-2 worked so well at Euro 2016? | Jonathan Wilson

results.firPara: Todays rumours are dealing with a strike
results.secPara: Todays rumours are dealing with a strike
results.webTitle: Football transfer rumours: Arsenal to sign Romelu Lukaku?

results.firPara: Former A-League rising star and Sydney FC midfielder Chris Naumoff has retired from the game due to a heart problem, aged just 21.
results.secPara: The Olyroo was released by the Sky Blues at the end of this years A-League season, but recently signed a three-year deal with Spanish Segunda Division club CD Numancia.
results.webTitle: Rising A-League star Chris Naumoff ends career after heart issues

results.firPara: Englands new manager is set to confront Spain, another team now without a head coach, in a friendly at Wembley as part of a reciprocal arrangement struck by the countries respective football associations after the teams meeting in Alicante last season.
results.secPara: The fixture is expected to be scheduled for 14 November, three days after England host Scotland in a World Cup qualifying tie at the national stadium. The team open their campaign in Slovakia on 4 September before a double-header against Malta at home and Slovenia away the following month. A similar friendly is also anticipated in France in 2017 after Les Bleus visited Wembley last November.
results.webTitle: England line up Spain friendly at Wembley as both sides look to rebuild

results.firPara: For the umpteenth time Gareth Bale fielded a Cristiano Ronaldo‑related question. Had he spoken to his Real Madrid team‑mate about Euro 2016 before they set off for the finals with Wales and Portugal respectively? No, Bale replied. I remember Toni Kroos saying wed only have three games. So, it would be nice to meet him in the final. It was a good laugh and a joke – a bit of banter.
results.secPara: Bale has had to put up with this sort of thing throughout his career from team‑mates like Kroos, the Germany midfielder, who not only expects to be involved at the major summer championships but to go far in them. Finally Bale is enjoying his moment. At their first tournament since the 1958 World Cup Wales have advanced, against the odds, to the semi-finals, where they face Portugal in Lyon on Wednesday night.
results.webTitle: Gareth Bale buoyant in Wales’ Euro 2016 bubble before Cristiano Ronaldo reunion

results.firPara: Gylfi Sigurdsson hopes to open talks with Swansea City over a new contract in the wake of his performances for Iceland at the European Championship.
results.secPara: The attacking midfielder was a key member of the side whose first appearance at a major finals saw them draw with Portugal and eliminate England before bowing out in the quarter-final against the hosts, France, on Sunday. Sigurdsson played every minute of his countrys five matches at Euro 2016, scoring against Hungary in the group stage and providing a constant threat from set pieces.
results.webTitle: Gylfi Sigurdsson urges Premier League clubs ‘to give Iceland players a go’

results.firPara: Ilkay Gundogan offers a telling illustration of why Pep Guardiola can be counted as the best manager on earth when stating that even Zlatan Ibrahimovic rates the Catalan among the very best. Even the players who dont like him [rate him] and the best example is Ibrahimovic, Manchester Citys new £21m signing from Borussia Dortmund says.
results.secPara: I read in his book that he doesnt like him. But he says he is the best coach he ever worked with. This is really special to read, but he is being honest. It is the same thing I heard from the players at Bayern Munich. They told me the same – that he can improve everyone. That is what is possible.
results.webTitle: Ilkay Gundogan expects Pep Guardiola to lift Manchester City to new heights

results.firPara: • Holiday booked for 11 July – the day after the Euro 2016 final
results.secPara: Gareth Bale has described Waless glory run to the Euro 2016 semi-finals as the greatest honour he has had in his career but the teams talisman has always believed that they could go deep into the tournament.
results.webTitle: Gareth Bale delights in ‘greatest honour’ but says Wales run is no shock
